text:
It is the most auspicious yoga for commencing any work.
 The conjunction of a particular day and specific nakshatra constitute this yoga.
 Few examples of Amrit yoga are Mool nakshatra falling on Sunday, Shravan nakshatra on Monday, Uttara bhadrapad on Tuesday, Kritika on Wednesday, Punarvasu on Thursday, Purvafalguni on Friday and Swati nakshatra falling on Saturday.
title: Amrit Yoga
